# detectsHands

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that detects hands of the body in the results, if they’re visible.

## Declaration

```swift
var detectsHands: Bool
```

## Discussion

The default value is `true,` and requires [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/DetectHumanBodyPoseRequest/Revision-swift.enum/revision2].

## Configuring a request

- **supportedJointNames**: The joint names the request supports.
- **supportedJointsGroupNames**: The joint group names the request supports.
